verbs.description: [V: skidding] [ARG1: ravens] hope to begin second - half surge vs steelers if the baltimore ravens are to end their run of three straight years without a playoff berth they 're going to have to play a whole lot better in the second half of the season baltimore staggered to the midpoint with a 500 record and two straight losses including a 36 - 21 dud at carolina on sunday that showcased many of the team shortcomings untimely penalties a turnover - prone offense and a porous defense fortunately for the ravens they still have time to get it right owings mills pittsburgh steelers baltimore ravens joe flacco john harbaugh ravens baltimore steelers
